item.description:
6:30 - Meet and greet (incl. food & drink for the hungry/thirsty)

7:00 - Opening remarks and call for Open Forum discussion topics

7:15 - Topic A: Learn to be a Firebug! -- Presented by Patricia Hammond.  Patricia will show us the in's and out's of using Firebug, an invaluable tool for inspecting the elements displayed on a website.  If you're interested in mastering the art and science of customizing websites (WordPress or otherwise), getting cozy with Firebug is a must!

8:00 - Open Forum

8:25 - Closing Remarks

8:30 - Post-Meetup Networking/Refreshments

group.name: Manchester, NH WordPress Developers and Users

item.name: June 2013 Meetup - Topic A: Learn to be a Firebug!
